introduction: Hello everyone, I'm a full-stack developer with 12+ year experience, demonstrated history in software industry.
Passionate about new technologies, constantly keep myself updated and enjoy working in a team.

technical_highlight.summary: With my years of experience, I can offer alot of benefits and flexibility:
highlights: I can work in almost all technical positions from frontend to backend or devops engineer.
Solid understanding and hands-on experience in programming design patterns.
Hands-on experience in software architechture, particularly micro-services, containerized applications and distributed systems.
The last two years, I have also got into data analysis and machine learning.
Invole all technical work (backend, devops and frontend) for all business applications.
Maintain the infrastructure on premise and clouds (Azure, AWS & Netlify).
Work on data import and analysis with Python.
Architect & design applications for migrating from monolithic to microservices.
Research and advise on technologies.
Develop and support a large distributed application, its api services & mobile apps.
Manage software release management process.
Lead teams in development, coordinate with testers, implementers, and release managers.
Research and advice on new technologies.

positions.role: GIS Analyst Consultant / Senior Developer (Geospatial Dept.)
highlights: Develop and deploy geospatial software and services, also provide support clients on long term maintenance.
Provide technical advice & lead overseas team to do development.
Architect & develop prototypes for presales, then convert them to proper products.
Develop/extend features for the company's accounting software.
Perform integration testing activities.
Provide technical support to clients.
Perform data migration on the Cortell software for clients.
Create/update web sites.
Perform integration testing activities.
Provide technical support to clients.

education.title: Master of Computer Scence, Data Visualization
notes: Research in Graphs and Data Visualization, the topic is to use forced-directed graphs to visualize how to learn English vocabularies and their collocations.

education.title: Bachelor (Hons) of Computing and Mathematics
notes: Activities and societies: Golden Key International Society member.
Specialize in Machine Learning & Data Mining.

education.provider: Ho Chi Minh University of Technology (HCMUT)
education.title: Bachelor's degree , Electrical and Electronics Engineering

projects.title: Geospatial Web Api
projects.note: A WebApi provides Restful services on searching geospatial features.
projects.project_description: A dotnet-core WebApi 7 provides Restful services for spatial and text searching services. Geo features can be stored in MongoDb and CosmosDb

projects.title: Geospatial Web App
projects.note: A simple website to search community places & addresses in Christchurch, New Zealand.
projects.project_description: A geospatial portal, it provides text and spatial searching services for some common features such as addresses, points of interest. The WebApp consumes our API services.

projects.title: Exporting Service (Html to Pdf/Word)
projects.note: A simple event driven architecture system exporting Html pages to Pdf/Word.
projects.project_description: Users just send a request containing a list of URLs, target format (Pdf/Word) and email address. Its components will received the request, converting Html pages to the target format, and then email to the user with exported file attached.

projects.title: New Netflix Clone
projects.project_description: Attempt to create all fullly operational pages such as Home, Browse, SignIn & SignUp.

projects.title: Netflix Clone (old)
projects.project_description: An experiment to re-create Netflix layout, but also add my point of view on the UI.

projects.title: Personal Blog
projects.note: Simple react web app to show my resume & projects.
projects.project_description: Experiment Bulma css and mix with styled-component.

projects.title: Geospatial search service
projects.note: A WebApi provides Restful services on searching geospatial features.
projects.project_description: A dotnet-core WebApi provides Restful services on searching geospatial features such as interested points or properties.

projects.title: Geospatial Web App
projects.note: A simple website to search places in Christchurch, New Zealand.
projects.project_description: A simple website to search places in Christchurch, New Zealand (working in progress). We can search points of interest such as parks, gardens, street addresses or houses.

projects.title: UI Automation Testing
projects.note: A simple example of automation UI testing.
projects.project_description: Specflow + Selenium WebDriver are using. The goal is to design a complete test library for the given site.

projects.title: Geospatial converting service
projects.project_description: Converts uploaded geojson file into gml, kml (Google Earth format) and another way around.
